patthana1.21:1.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.21:1.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.21:1.1_2: ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana1.21:1.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā
patthana1.21:1.1_4: …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:2.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bahiddhā ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.21:2.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.21:2.1_2: bahiddhā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca
patthana1.21:2.1_3: dve khandhā …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ
patthana1.21:2.1_4: paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:3.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ
patthana1.21:3.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṁ
patthana1.21:3.1_2: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:4.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—bahiddhā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:5.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ
patthana1.21:5.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… ekaṁ
patthana1.21:5.1_2: mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:6.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—bahiddhā ekaṁ
patthana1.21:6.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… ekaṁ
patthana1.21:6.1_2: mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:7.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati anantarapaccayā, samanantarapaccayā,
patthana1.21:7.1_1: sahajātapaccayā—ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ
patthana1.21:7.1_2: …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā
patthana1.21:7.1_3: kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:7.1_4: Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ
patthana1.21:7.1_5: kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ. Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ
patthana1.21:7.1_6: mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:8.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā—bahiddhā ekaṁ
patthana1.21:8.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.21:8.1_2: bahiddhā ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana1.21:8.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… mahābhūte
patthana1.21:8.1_4: paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ. bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.21:8.1_5: … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca
patthana1.21:9.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā … nissayapaccayā
patthana1.21:9.1_2: natthi) … kammapaccayā … vipākapaccayā … āhārapaccayā … indriyapaccayā … jhānapaccayā
patthana1.21:10.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana1.21:12.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ ajjhattaṁ
patthana1.21:12.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana1.21:12.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. Ekaṁ
patthana1.21:12.1_3: mahābhūtaṁ …pe… āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ
patthana1.21:12.1_4: …pe… mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
patthana1.21:13.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bahiddhā
patthana1.21:13.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana1.21:13.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. Ekaṁ
patthana1.21:13.1_3: mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ
patthana1.21:13.1_4: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
patthana1.21:14.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— ajjhatte khandhe
patthana1.21:14.1_1: paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhatte khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:14.1_2: Khandhe paṭicca vatthu …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.21:15.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—bahiddhā khandhe
patthana1.21:15.1_1: paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhā khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.
patthana1.21:15.1_2: Khandhe paṭicca vatthu …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.21:16.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …pe… (anulomasahajātasadisaṁ,
patthana1.21:16.1_2: napurejātapaccayā—arūpe ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe… ajjhatte khandhe paṭicca
patthana1.21:16.1_3: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā
patthana1.21:16.1_4: kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana1.21:16.1_5: Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca …pe… āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:17.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe bahiddhā
patthana1.21:17.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe… dve khandhe …pe… bahiddhā khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.21:17.1_2: rūpaṁ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe (paripuṇṇaṁ) ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.21:18.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā, naāsevanapaccayā,
patthana1.21:18.1_1: nakammapaccayā—ajjhatte khandhe paṭicca ajjhattā cetanā. Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:19.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bahiddhā khandhe paṭicca bahiddhā cetanā. bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ ….
patthana1.21:20.1: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi), naāhārapaccayā—utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:21.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā—bāhiraṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:22.1: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā— āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ … mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṁ.
patthana1.21:23.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā—bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ … mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṁ.
patthana1.21:24.1: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ …pe… āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:25.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ …pe… bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:26.1: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā … nasampayuttapaccayā … navippayuttapaccayā— arūpe …pe… āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.21:27.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā— arūpe …pe…
patthana1.21:27.1_1: bāhiraṁ … āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ … asaññasattānaṁ …pe… nonatthipaccayā, novigatapaccayā.
patthana1.21:28.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare dve, nasamanantare dve (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha dve), novigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.21:30.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve …pe… navipāke nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.21:32.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve …pe… magge dve …pe… avigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.21:35.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.21:35.1_1: paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.21:35.1_2: (paripuṇṇaṁ). Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… vatthuṁ paccayā ajjhattā khandhā.
patthana1.21:36.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bahiddhā ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.21:36.1_1: paccayā tayo khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… vatthuṁ paccayā bahiddhā khandhā.
patthana1.21:37.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā (paṭiccavārasadisaṁ),
patthana1.21:37.1_1: cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ …pe… vatthuṁ
patthana1.21:38.1: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā (paṭiccavārasadisaṁ), Cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ …pe… vatthuṁ paccayā bahiddhā khandhā.
patthana1.21:39.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā … (vatthuṁ atirekaṁ,
patthana1.21:39.1_2: paripuṇṇā) mahābhūte paccayā …pe… (mahābhūtānaṁ khandhānañca pacchā pañcāyatanāni
patthana1.21:39.1_3: ca vatthu ca kātabbā) aññamaññapaccayā … nissayapaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.21:42.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ ajjhattaṁ
patthana1.21:42.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhe paccayā
patthana1.21:42.1_2: vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā. Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… āhārasamuṭṭhānaṁ … utusamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana1.21:42.1_3: … asaññasattānaṁ …pe… Cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ …pe… vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā
patthana1.21:42.1_4: ajjhattā khandhā. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā
patthana1.21:43.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (pavattipaṭisandhipi
patthana1.21:43.1_1: mahābhūtāpi kātabbā)—Cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ …pe… vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā
patthana1.21:43.1_2: bahiddhā khandhā. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā
patthana1.21:45.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe dve …pe… novigate dve.
patthana1.21:47.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve …pe… navipāke nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve.
patthana1.21:52.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—ajjhattā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.21:53.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bahiddhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.21:54.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ
patthana1.21:54.1_1: samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.21:54.1_2: …pe… ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, pahīne
patthana1.21:54.1_3: kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese
patthana1.21:54.1_4: jānanti. Ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe …pe… phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … ajjhatte
patthana1.21:54.1_5: khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo
patthana1.21:54.1_6: uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā
patthana1.21:54.1_7: saddaṁ suṇāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ
patthana1.21:54.1_9: kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.21:55.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—paro ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ
patthana1.21:55.1_1: …pe… vatthuṁ … ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.21:55.1_2: taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati,
patthana1.21:55.1_3: dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Cetopariyañāṇena ajjhattacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ
patthana1.21:55.1_4: jānāti. Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ
patthana1.21:55.1_5: bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
patthana1.21:56.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—paro dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ
patthana1.21:56.1_1: samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati,
patthana1.21:56.1_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe… ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti
patthana1.21:56.1_3: … nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya
patthana1.21:56.1_4: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese
patthana1.21:56.1_5: paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe… paro bahiddhā cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … bahiddhā
patthana1.21:56.1_6: khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya
patthana1.21:56.1_7: sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Cetopariyañāṇena bahiddhā cittasamaṅgissa …pe… ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ
patthana1.21:56.1_9: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṁ bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… bahiddhā
patthana1.21:56.1_10: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… bahiddhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
patthana1.21:57.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.21:57.1_1: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana1.21:57.1_2: paccayo. Bahiddhā cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … bahiddhā khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ
patthana1.21:57.1_3: uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Cetopariyañāṇena
patthana1.21:57.1_4: bahiddhā cittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti. Bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṁ ajjhattaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:57.1_5: …pe… bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ ajjhattaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… bahiddhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
patthana1.21:58.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.21:58.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā,
patthana1.21:58.1_2: taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.21:58.1_3: jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… phalaṁ garuṁ
patthana1.21:58.1_4: katvā paccavekkhanti. Ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā
patthana1.21:58.1_5: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—ajjhattādhipati
patthana1.21:58.1_6: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:59.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—paro
patthana1.21:59.1_1: ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.21:59.1_2: taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:60.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.21:60.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—paro dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā, taṁ garuṁ
patthana1.21:60.1_2: katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe… ariyā
patthana1.21:60.1_3: maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… phalaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… nibbānaṁ garuṁ
patthana1.21:60.1_4: katvā paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.21:60.1_5: paccayo. Bahiddhā cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … bahiddhā khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.21:60.1_6: taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—bahiddhādhipati
patthana1.21:60.1_7: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:61.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā
patthana1.21:61.1_1: nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa,
patthana1.21:61.1_2: adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhā cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … bahiddhā khandhe garuṁ
patthana1.21:61.1_3: katvā assādeti, abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo …pe… diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:62.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā ajjhattā
patthana1.21:62.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:62.1_2: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassa, gotrabhu maggassa, vodānaṁ maggassa, maggo
patthana1.21:62.1_3: phalassa, phalaṁ phalassa, anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
patthana1.21:63.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Purimā purimā bahiddhāti nānākaraṇaṁ, taṁyeva gamanaṁ.)
patthana1.21:64.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe… (anantarasadisaṁ) … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:65.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.21:65.1_2: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ …pe… jhānaṁ …pe… vipassanaṁ …pe… maggaṁ
patthana1.21:65.1_3: …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Ajjhattaṁ
patthana1.21:65.1_4: sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … utuṁ
patthana1.21:65.1_5: … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, pāṇaṁ hanati
patthana1.21:65.1_6: …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Ajjhattā saddhā …pe… paññā, rāgo …pe… patthanā, kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ
patthana1.21:65.1_7: … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … senāsanaṁ ajjhattāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, rāgassa …pe… patthanāya,
patthana1.21:65.1_8: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:66.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.21:66.1_1: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—paro ajjhattaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti
patthana1.21:66.1_2: …pe… mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Paro ajjhattaṁ sīlaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya
patthana1.21:66.1_3: dānaṁ deti, pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Ajjhattā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ bahiddhā
patthana1.21:67.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.21:67.1_2: patthanaṁ, kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati
patthana1.21:67.1_3: bahiddhā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ bahiddhā saddhāya …pe… phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:68.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.21:68.1_2: dānaṁ deti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Bahiddhā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ ajjhattāya saddhāya
patthana1.21:69.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:69.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato
patthana1.21:69.1_2: anattato vipassati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya
patthana1.21:69.1_3: sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:69.1_5: kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:70.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—paro
patthana1.21:70.1_1: ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā
patthana1.21:70.1_2: rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ bahiddhā
patthana1.21:70.1_3: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:71.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:71.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—paro bahiddhā cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe…
patthana1.21:71.1_2: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṁ
patthana1.21:71.1_3: bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:72.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—bahiddhā
patthana1.21:72.1_1: cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati,
patthana1.21:72.1_2: dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṁ ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:72.1_3: …pe… bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:73.1_0: Ajjhatto ca bahiddhā ca dhammā ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:73.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ cakkhāyatanañca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:73.1_2: purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe… bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ kāyāyatanañca
patthana1.21:73.1_3: ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca …pe… bahiddhā
patthana1.21:73.1_4: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:74.1_0: Ajjhatto ca bahiddhā ca dhammā bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:74.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:74.1_2: purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe… ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca
patthana1.21:74.1_3: bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā
patthana1.21:74.1_4: vatthu ca …pe… ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ
patthana1.21:75.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:76.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā bahiddhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:77.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā ajjhattā
patthana1.21:77.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:77.1_2: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa
patthana1.21:78.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā …pe…. (Ajjhattasadisaṁyeva.)
patthana1.21:79.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.21:79.1_1: Sahajātā—ajjhattā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.21:79.1_2: kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—ajjhattā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.21:80.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.21:80.1_1: Sahajātā—bahiddhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.21:80.1_2: kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—bahiddhā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhā khandhānaṁ
patthana1.21:81.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Paripuṇṇaṁ, paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.21:82.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhattā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.21:82.1_1: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.21:82.1_2: …pe… ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:83.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:84.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi) bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:85.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:86.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto
patthana1.21:86.1_1: kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:87.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:88.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, ajjhattikā indriyā
patthana1.21:89.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.21:90.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:90.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajāto—ajjhatto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.21:90.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā
patthana1.21:90.1_3: vatthussa …pe… vatthu khandhānaṁ …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ
patthana1.21:90.1_5: ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa
patthana1.21:90.1_6: imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa
patthana1.21:91.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ. Purejātaṁ—paro
patthana1.21:91.1_1: ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati,
patthana1.21:91.1_2: dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā
patthana1.21:91.1_3: kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa
patthana1.21:92.1: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Bahiddhā ninnānākaraṇaṁ, mātikāpadāni vitthāretabbāni.)
patthana1.21:93.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ. Purejātaṁ—bahiddhā
patthana1.21:93.1_1: cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ …pe… dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ
patthana1.21:93.1_2: suṇāti, bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṁ …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena
patthana1.21:93.1_3: paccayo. Bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:94.1_1: āhāraṁ. Purejātaṁ—bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ cakkhu ca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:94.1_2: …pe… bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ kāyāyatanañca ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:94.1_3: atthipaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca …pe… bahiddhā
patthana1.21:94.1_4: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_5: Āhāraṁ—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa
patthana1.21:95.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ,
patthana1.21:95.1_1: āhāraṁ. Purejātaṁ—ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.21:95.1_2: atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca
patthana1.21:95.1_3: bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā
patthana1.21:95.1_4: vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca
patthana1.21:95.1_5: bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Āhāraṁ—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro
patthana1.21:95.1_6: āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:96.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:97.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare dve, samanantare dve,
patthana1.21:97.1_1: sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte āsevane
patthana1.21:97.1_2: kamme vipāke dve, āhāre cha, indriye dve, jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte dve,
patthana1.21:97.1_3: atthiyā cha, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate cha. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.21:99.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.21:99.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.21:99.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:100.1: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:101.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.21:101.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.21:101.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:102.1: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:103.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:104.1: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:105.1_0: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha cha kātabbā),
patthana1.21:105.1_1: navippayutte cha, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha, noavigate cattāri (evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ)
patthana1.21:107.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye
patthana1.21:107.1_1: dve (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha dve), nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.21:109.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomapadāni gaṇetabbāni), avigate cha. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
